entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
